title: What President got us out of the Vietnam War? - Quora
tags: Presidents of the United States of America
History of the United States of America

response.answer_text: President Richard M. Nixon disengaged the US from the Vietnam War. Unless the US was willing to risk war with China and/or the USSR, the war in Vietnam was a lose/lose situation. Toward the final days of the US having a presence in Vietnam, the north was on the ropes. However, had the US “won”, the US would likely still be in Vietnam, shoring up a welfare state. As it turned out, the US exited at the best time.
